LanguageData.AF_Cloak_SG_Sydaily_Crystal_front.label: Sydaily Crystal Cloak（F）
LanguageData.AF_Cloak_SG_Sydaily_Crystal_front.descri: Woven from Gylanly fibres, this incredible material was not surpassed by synthetic materials until Ferian broke through the light barrier. The joint is inlaid with a huge Sydaily crystal, which is connected with the crystal of the head of the clan of Ferian. \n\nTogether, they can unleash a set of positions that can destroy any approaching 【danger at high speed】 within a certain range. At the same time, elegant dress can also make the charm of Ferians reached a new height~
LanguageData.AF_Cloak_SG_Sydaily_Crystal_back.label: Sydaily Crystal Cloak（B）
LanguageData.AF_Cloak_SG_Sydaily_Crystal_back.descrip: Woven from Gylanly fibres, this incredible material was not surpassed by synthetic materials until Ferian broke through the light barrier. The joint is inlaid with a huge Sydaily crystal, which is connected with the crystal of the head of the clan of Ferian. \n\nTogether, they can unleash a set of positions that can destroy any approaching 【danger at high speed】 within a certain range. At the same time, elegant dress can also make the charm of Ferians reached a new height~
